General.Name: Nanhua Futures Co Ltd
General.Description: Nanhua Futures Co., Ltd. operates a financial derivatives service platform. The company is involved in the commodity and financial futures brokerage, futures investment consulting, asset management business, and securities investment fund sales agency businesses. It also provides risk management and overseas financial services. The company offers its services in Mainland China, Hong Kong, London, Chicago, and Singapore. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.
